result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jake F Groom

records.addlTxt:
9:37 AM Case called - appearances stated. Cases 22CF05, 22CF24 & 22TR07 called together
Attorney Joshua Hargrove in court for Jake F Groom.  Attorney Luke Steiner in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jake F Groom not in court. 

Atty Hargrove states he has no information on defendant's non-appearance - requests that court wait until the end of the day to sign a warrant, if one is to be issued
State requests a warrant be issued
Court authorizes a warrant - will wait until the end of the day to sign warrant
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:30 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jake F Groom in court.  Attorney Joshua Hargrove in court for Jake F Groom.  Attorney Luke Steiner in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Hargrove is heard.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:55 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jake F Groom appeared by video.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Joshua Hargrove appeared by video for Jake F Groom. 

2022CF00005, 2022CF000024, 2022TR000007 called together. 

Atty Hargrove is heard on the status of the cases. Requests 45-50 days.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Jury status hearing on June 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.

9:33 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jake F Groom appeared by phone.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Joshua Hargrove appeared by video for Jake F Groom. 

Atty Hargrove is heard on status. Cases are in discovery. Requests a status in June.
Jury status hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 11:00 am.

2:30 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Jake F Groom appeared by phone, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Joshua Hargrove appeared by video for Jake F Groom. 

Atty Hargrove is heard and ready to go forward. 

Defendant waives right to preliminary hearing in 22CF24 and 22CF05. Court accepts waiver for both cases and binds matter over for further proceedings. 
22TR07 will ride along. 

Defendant plead not guilty as to each of the four counts.  Clerk will enter not guilty plea in 22CF05.
Defendant plead not guilty as to each of the two counts Clerk will enter not guilty plea in 22CF07.
Jury status hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Jury status hearing on April 27, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Request by Atty Hargrove to adjourn the 2/15/22 hrgs to a later date.  Approved by DA Steiner and JA.  Rescheduled to 3/2/22 at 2:30 PM by Zoom 884 250 0778.
Preliminary hearing on March 2, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jake F Groom
Current: 138 Bridge St, Steuben, WI 54657 United States  (Effective: 02-14-2022)
Prior: E10525 State Road 136, Baraboo, WI 53913

2:00 PM Defendant Jake F Groom appeared in court, Attorney Tracey A. Wood appeared by video for Jake F Groom, Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Crawford appearing via video on behalf of the defendant. 

Court informs Def. of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Def. states understanding.  

Atty Steiner is heard on bond. Requests a standard signature bond.
Atty Crawford is heard. 

Court orders a $500.00 signature bond with standard conditions.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on February 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
